str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To sleep, be sleeping. From kata and heudo; to lie down to rest, i.e. to fall asleep.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To sleep, be sleeping. From kata and heudo; to lie down to rest, i.e. to fall asleep.
The night, night-time. A primary word; 'night'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To make drunk; pass: I become drunk. A prolonged form of methuo; to intoxicate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To be intoxicated with wine, be drunk. From another form of methe; to drink to intoxication, i.e. Get drunk.
The night, night-time. A primary word; 'night'.
